SELECT B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.WRITER, B.REGDATE, B.UPDATEDATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM YUN_REPLY R WHERE R.BNO = B.BNO AND RDEPTH = 0 ) AS repCount , LISTAGG(F.ATTACH_PATH, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY F.ATTACH_PATH DESC) AS ATTACH_PATH FROM YUNBOARD B LEFT JOIN YUN_FILE F ON B.BNO = F.BNO GROUP BY B.BNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.WRITER, B.REGDATE, B.UPDATEDATE ORDER BY BNO DESC offset (#{pageNum}-1)*10 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
